UnpoweredCapsules.desc: Life Support Towers only activate after 20 enemies have been killed within a 15m radius of them.

DoubleTrouble.desc: Two Necramech Demolishers will attack any conduit, but their health is reduced.

AlchemicalShields.desc: 10% of enemies are equipped with an impervious Elemental Barrier that can only be destroyed by an Amphor of the corresponding element.

/Lotus/Upgrades/Calendar/ElectricalDamag.desc: On landing from a bullet jump gain +50% Electricity Damage for 3s.
